title: Ketanji Brown Jackson’s Hearings to Focus on Legal Experience, Record on Crime
sub_head: Republicans say confirmation hearings will probe Supreme Court nominee’s work as a public defender
body:
WASHINGTON—Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson and her supporters plan to highlight her legal experience and history of working with Republicans during her Supreme Court confirmation hearings this week, as GOP senators prepare to question her record on sentences for people convicted of crimes.
White House officials, previewing the start of Monday’s hearings, said Judge Jackson is expected to point out that her confirmation would make history as the first Black woman to serve on the nation’s highest court.
